pageProps.body:
Bayesian Linear Regression

Compute full posterior, make predictions by taking account of all possible model parameters.

Train

With bayes' theorem

p(θ∣X,y)=p(y∣X,θ)p(θ)p(y∣X)p(\pmb{\theta}|\pmb{X}, \pmb{y}) = \frac{p(\pmb{y}|\pmb{X}, \pmb{\theta})p(\pmb{\theta})}{p(\pmb{y}|\pmb{X})}p(θθ∣XX,yy)=p(yy∣XX)p(yy∣XX,θθ)p(θθ)​

We have

p(θ∣X,y)∝p(y∣X,θ)p(θ)p(\pmb{\theta}|\pmb{X}, \pmb{y}) \propto p(\pmb{y}|\pmb{X}, \pmb{\theta})p(\pmb{\theta})p(θθ∣XX,yy)∝p(yy∣XX,θθ)p(θθ)

Given likelihood p(y∣X,θ)=N(y∣Φθ,σ2I)p(\pmb{y}|\pmb{X}, \pmb{\theta}) = \mathcal{N}(\pmb{y}|\pmb{\Phi}\pmb{\theta}, \sigma^2 \pmb{I})p(yy∣XX,θθ)=N(yy∣ΦΦθθ,σ2II), assuming Gaussian prior p(θ)=N(θ∣m0,S0)p(\pmb{\theta}) = \mathcal{N}(\pmb{\theta}|\pmb{m}_0, \pmb{S}_0)p(θθ)=N(θθ∣mm0​,SS0​), p(θ∣X,y)p(\pmb{\theta}|\pmb{X}, \pmb{y})p(θθ∣XX,yy) is also Gaussian distributed.

Assume p(θ∣X,y)=N(θ∣mN,SN)p(\pmb{\theta}|\pmb{X}, \pmb{y}) = \mathcal{N}(\pmb{\theta}|\pmb{m}_N, \pmb{S}_N)p(θθ∣XX,yy)=N(θθ∣mmN​,SSN​), we have

N(θ∣mN,SN)∝N(y∣Φθ,σ2I)N(θ∣m0,S0)\mathcal{N}(\pmb{\theta}|\pmb{m}_N, \pmb{S}_N) \propto \mathcal{N}(\pmb{y}|\pmb{\Phi \theta}, \sigma^2 \pmb{I}) \mathcal{N}(\pmb{\theta}|\pmb{m}_0, \pmb{S}_0)N(θθ∣mmN​,SSN​)∝N(yy∣ΦθΦθ,σ2II)N(θθ∣mm0​,SS0​)

Apply linear transform θ=(ΦTΦ)−1ΦTy\pmb{\theta} = (\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi})^{-1}\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{y}θθ=(ΦΦTΦΦ)−1ΦΦTyy to transform Gaussian variable y\pmb{y}yy to θ\pmb{\theta}θθ

N(y∣Φθ,σ2I)=N((ΦTΦ)−1ΦTy∣(ΦTΦ)−1ΦTΦ(ΦTΦ)−1ΦTy,σ2(ΦTΦ)−1ΦT((ΦTΦ)−1ΦT)T)=N(θ∣(ΦTΦ)−1ΦTy,σ2(ΦTΦ)−1)\begin{aligned} \mathcal{N}(\pmb{y}|\pmb{\Phi \theta}, \sigma^2 \pmb{I}) &= \mathcal{N}((\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi})^{-1}\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{y}|(\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi})^{-1}\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi}(\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi})^{-1}\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{y}, \sigma^2 (\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi})^{-1}\pmb{\Phi}^T((\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi})^{-1}\pmb{\Phi}^T)^T) \\ &= \mathcal{N}(\pmb{\theta}|(\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi})^{-1}\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{y}, \sigma^2 (\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi})^{-1}) \end{aligned}N(yy∣ΦθΦθ,σ2II)​=N((ΦΦTΦΦ)−1ΦΦTyy∣(ΦΦTΦΦ)−1ΦΦTΦΦ(ΦΦTΦΦ)−1ΦΦTyy,σ2(ΦΦTΦΦ)−1ΦΦT((ΦΦTΦΦ)−1ΦΦT)T)=N(θθ∣(ΦΦTΦΦ)−1ΦΦTyy,σ2(ΦΦTΦΦ)−1)​

Use Gaussian Product rule

SN=(m0−1+σ−2(ΦTΦ))−1mN=SN(S0−1m0+σ−2ΦTy)\pmb{S}_N = (\pmb{m}_0^{-1} + \sigma^{-2} (\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{\Phi}))^{-1} \\ \pmb{m}_N = \pmb{S}_N(\pmb{S}_0^{-1} \pmb{m}_0 + \sigma^{-2}\pmb{\Phi}^T\pmb{y})SSN​=(mm0−1​+σ−2(ΦΦTΦΦ))−1mmN​=SSN​(SS0−1​mm0​+σ−2ΦΦTyy)

Inference

For new data, the predictive distribution

y∗=ϕ(x∗)Tθ+ϵp(y∗∣X,y,ϕ(x∗))=∫p(y∗∣ϕ(x∗),θ)p(θ∣X,y)dθ=N(ϕ(x∗)TmN,ϕ(x∗)TSNϕ(x∗)+σ2)y_* = \phi(\pmb{x_*})^T \pmb{\theta} + \epsilon \\ p(y_*|\pmb{X}, \pmb{y}, \phi(\pmb{x_*})) = \int p(y_*|\phi(\pmb{x_*}), \pmb{\theta}) p(\pmb{\theta} | \pmb{X}, \pmb{y}) d \pmb{\theta} = \mathcal{N}(\phi(\pmb{x_*})^T\pmb{m}_N, \phi(\pmb{x_*})^T \pmb{S}_N\phi(\pmb{x_*}) + \sigma^2)y∗​=ϕ(x∗​x∗​)Tθθ+ϵp(y∗​∣XX,yy,ϕ(x∗​x∗​))=∫p(y∗​∣ϕ(x∗​x∗​),θθ)p(θθ∣XX,yy)dθθ=N(ϕ(x∗​x∗​)TmmN​,ϕ(x∗​x∗​)TSSN​ϕ(x∗​x∗​)+σ2)

Predictive mean coincides with MAP

Integrate out θ\pmb{\theta}θθ induces the distribution of function

f(.)∼N(ϕ(.)TmN,ϕ(.)TSNϕ(.))f(.) \sim \mathcal{N}(\phi(.)^T\pmb{m}_N, \phi(.)^T \pmb{S}_N\phi(.))f(.)∼N(ϕ(.)TmmN​,ϕ(.)TSSN​ϕ(.))

ϕ(.)TmN\phi(.)^T\pmb{m}_Nϕ(.)TmmN​ is the mean function

By sampling θi∼p(θ∣X,y)\pmb{\theta}_i \sim p(\pmb{\theta} | \pmb{X}, \pmb{y})θθi​∼p(θθ∣XX,yy), we obtain a function realization fi(.)=ϕ(.)Tθif_i(.) = \phi(.)^T\pmb{\theta}_ifi​(.)=ϕ(.)Tθθi​

noteIndex.title: Root
noteIndex.body:
My personal knowledge cache using [Dendron](https://www.dendron.so)

## History
It was during my first job, at the start-up company called PixelShift.AI, that I acquired most prominent skill as a software engineer-the ability to read source code. It opened up a new way of learning and my knowledge expanded rapidly ever since. Learning new things is thriving but noting them down cogently and organized is hard. I often found myself forget the context few month later, making the notes completely intelligible. Additionally, some notes need frequent update as my previous understanding could be parochial, antiquated or even erroneous.

In desperate attempt to facilitate the noting/updating experience, I came across [Dendron](https://www.dendron.so) and found it surprisingly congenial to my personal need. With it, I have gradually grown the habit of caching, linking back and extending my knowledge base.

## Disclaimer
The notes are collections of information I found along the journey. I use backquote to denote sources, but I am likely to miss some references, so apology in advance. Also, they are my personal understandings, usually added when I first encounter the topic and will be updated only when I come across it again, so some of them could be incomplete or wrong.
